original_text: So we have learned about many people who trusted God long ago. They are like a very big crowd all round us and we should copy their example. We must be like people who run in a race. We must throw away everything that stops us from running well. The sins that we do make us fall down very easily. We must not let those sins rule us. God has prepared the way that is in front of us. We must continue to be strong while we run along that way. We must choose to run that race well.
korean_text: 이러므로 우리에게 구름 같이 둘러싼 허다한 증인들이 있으니 모든 무거운 것과 얽매이기 쉬운 죄를 벗어 버리고 인내로써 우리 앞에 당한 경주를 하며

sentences.original_text: So we have learned about many people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 많은 사람들에 대해 배웠습니다

sentences.original_text: They are like a very big crowd
and we should copy their example
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그들의 본을 따라야 합니다

sentences.original_text: We must be like people who run in a race
that stops us from running well
The sins that we do make us fall down very easily
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 짓는 죄들은 우리를 매우 쉽게 넘어뜨립니다

sentences.original_text: We must not let those sins rule us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 죄들이 우리를 다스리게 해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: that is in front of us
We must continue to be strong
while we run along that way
We must choose to run that race well
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 경주를 잘 달리기로 선택해야 합니다
